类 PojoCsvInputFormat<OUT>

  • 类型参数:
    OUT - resulting POJO type
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, CheckpointableInputFormat<FileInputSplit,java.lang.Long>, InputFormat<OUT,FileInputSplit>, InputSplitSource<FileInputSplit>

    @Internal
public class PojoCsvInputFormat<OUT>
extends CsvInputFormat<OUT>
    Input format that reads csv into POJOs.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • open

        public void open(FileInputSplit split)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: DelimitedInputFormat
        Opens the given input split. This method opens the input stream to the specified file, allocates read buffers and positions the stream at the correct position, making sure that any partial record at the beginning is skipped.
        指定者:
        open 在接口中 InputFormat<OUT,FileInputSplit>
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 CsvInputFormat<OUT>
        参数:
        split - The input split to open.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the spit could not be opened due to an I/O problem.
        另请参阅:
        FileInputFormat.open(org.apache.flink.core.fs.FileInputSplit)

      • findAllFields

        private void findAllFields(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.reflect.Field> allFields)
        Finds all declared fields in a class and all its super classes.
        参数:
        clazz - Class for which all declared fields are found
        allFields - Map containing all found fields so far
